titles.title: To authorize the President to award a gold medal on behalf of the Congress to Jesse L. Jackson, Sr. in recognition of his outstanding and enduring contributions to the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth
committee.name: House Financial Services

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/20/2001--Introduced. Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of Congress, a congressional gold medal to Jesse L. Jackson, Sr., in recognition of his outstanding and enduring contributions to the Nation.
